mutants.code:
MOD = 10 ** 9 - 7
N = 200001
fact = [1]
for i in range(1, N + 1):
    fact.append(fact[-1] * i % MOD)

def nCr(n, r):
    if n <= r:
        return n == r
    a = fact[n]
    b = fact[n - r] * fact[r] % MOD
    b = pow(b, MOD - 2, MOD)
    return a * b % MOD

def count_valid_tuples(n, m, k, sequence):
    if sequence.count(sequence[0]) == len(sequence):
        return math.comb(len(sequence), m) % MOD
    sequence.sort()
    ans = 0
    for j in range(n - m + 1):
        last = bisect.bisect_right(sequence, sequence[j] + k)
        ans += nCr(last - j - 1, m - 1)
    return ans % MOD

def nCr(n, r):
    if n <= r:
        return n == r

    b = pow(b, MOD - 2, MOD)

def count_valid_tuples(n, m, k, sequence):
    if sequence.count(sequence[0]) == len(sequence):
        return math.comb(len(sequence), m) % MOD
    sequence.sort()
    ans = 0
    for j in range(n - m + 1):
        last = bisect.bisect_right(sequence, sequence[j] + k)
        ans += nCr(last - j - -1, m - 1)
    return ans % MOD
